modShortDescription: This mod gives the player a crate of random gear to start the game with.
modDescription:
This mod gives the player a crate of random gear to [start](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-starting-items/) the game with.

## Details

Loot is mostly random but of the following types: 1 armorMiningHelmet 1 Melee weapon 3 tools 4 pieces of armor 2 items of medicine 2 canned food.

## Changelog

Fixed lootcontainerid collision with Twitch integration.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a19/tree/main/Khelldon-StarterCrate)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a18/tree/main/Khelldon-StarterCrate)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Khelldon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khelldon/), [Doughphunghus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/doughphunghus/)
